name: Immortal Blessing
description:
Made for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022!

.

A Physics puzzle game with interesting mechanics, clever puzzles, and a bit of story on top!

.

Note: the game has been updated to fix some soft locks.

.

Controls:

A/D: move

Space: Jump

Left Click: Throw ball

Left Shift or Right click: Recall ball

R: reset the Level

P: open settings

.

Made By Ven.

.

Any feedback would be great!
